content.data:
[Y]M4 Expansion Board
[W]Modern convenience with classic
[W]workflow.
[c][m.]
[W]M4 command exchange uses a dataport
[W]and an acknowledge port for host
[W]communication.
[W]File, network and socket commands are
[W]provided through a ROM-level response
[W]buffer.
[c][m.]
[G]- Dataport FE00.
[G]- Ack port FC00.
[G]- Response pointer in ROM table.
[m][m-]
[Y]TECH NOTE
[C]Read the response pointer, do not
[C]hardcode it.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
